response.overview: A quiet night in North Ontario is cut short. A simple mob hit unknowingly sparks a war between two opposing families. An under-experienced police department is forced to take the help of a renegade cop, banned from New Zealand. Drug Smuggling, Professional Wrestling, Dirty Cops, Bird Watching, a City caught in the middle of unspeakable violence and today's lunch special...is a Meatloaf Sandwich.
response.title: Town of Verne
